mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Go South, Young Man.": The Honorable Chauncey M. Depew, in an address to the Alumni Association of Yale University, said, of his recent tour through the Southern States .. : Go to Virginia, where the development is the widest! Where the opportunities are the greatest!! Where all are welcome!!! / For all information apply at agencies Norfolk and Western Railroad
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Depew, Chauncey M. (Chauncey Mitchell), 1834-1928 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text consists primarily of an excerpt from Depew's address, followed by the promotional statement for Virginia and train information. [original]
Norfolk and Western logo in red at top of sheet. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Southern States--Economic conditions
Virginia--Economic conditions
